theorem putnam_1997_a3
(series1 series2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hseries1 : series1 = fun x => ∑' n : ℕ, (-1)^n * x^(2*n + 1)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, 2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1)))
(hseries2 : series2 = fun x => ∑' n : ℕ, x^(2*n)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, (2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1))^2))
: Tendsto (fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, series1 x * series2 x) atTop (𝓝 (putnam_1997_a3_solution)) := by
  have h₁ : (fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, series1 x * series2 x) = fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, (∑' n : ℕ, (-1)^n * x^(2*n + 1)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, 2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1))) * (∑' n : ℕ, x^(2*n)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, (2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1))^2)) := by
    ext t
    simp [hseries1, hseries2]
  rw [h₁]
  have h₂ : (fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, (∑' n : ℕ, (-1)^n * x^(2*n + 1)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, 2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1))) * (∑' n : ℕ, x^(2*n)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, (2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1))^2))) = fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, (x * (1)) := by
    funext t
    -- Use the fact that the series converge to specific functions to simplify the integrand
    have h₃ : ∀ x : ℝ, x ∈ Set.Icc 0 t → (∑' n : ℕ, (-1)^n * x^(2*n + 1)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, 2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1))) * (∑' n : ℕ, x^(2*n)/(∏ i : Finset.range n, (2 * ((i : ℝ) + 1))^2)) = x := by
      intro x hx
      have h₄ : x ∈ Set.Icc 0 t := hx
      have h₅ : 0 ≤ x := by exact h₄.1
      have h₆ : x ≤ t := by exact h₄.2
      -- Use the fact that the series converge to specific functions to simplify the integrand
      simp [hseries1, hseries2]
      <;> norm_num
      <;>
      simp_all [tsum_eq_single 0, tsum_eq_single 0]
      <;>
      norm_num
      <;>
      ring_nf
      <;>
      norm_num
      <;>
      simp_all [Finset.prod_range_succ', Finset.prod_range_one, pow_add, pow_one, mul_assoc]
      <;>
      field_simp
      <;>
      ring_nf
      <;>
      norm_num
      <;>
      linarith
    exact integral_congr_ae (by
      filter_upwards [ae_restrict_mem measurableSet_Icc] with x hx using h₃ x hx)
  rw [h₂]
  have h₃ : (fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, (x * (1 : ℝ))) = fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, x := by
    funext t
    simp [mul_one]
  rw [h₃]
  have h₄ : Tendsto (fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, x) atTop (𝓝 (Real.sqrt (Real.exp 1))) := by
    -- Use the fact that the integral of x from 0 to t is t^2/2 and apply the limit
    have h₅ : Tendsto (fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, x) atTop (𝓝 (Real.sqrt (Real.exp 1))) := by
      -- Use the fact that the integral of x from 0 to t is t^2/2 and apply the limit
      have h₆ : (fun t => ∫ x in Set.Icc 0 t, x) = fun t => t^2 / 2 := by
        funext t
        simp [integral_id]
        <;> ring
      rw [h₆]
      have h₇ : Tendsto (fun t => t^2 / 2 : ℝ → ℝ) atTop (𝓝 (Real.sqrt (Real.exp 1))) := by
        have h₈ : Tendsto (fun t => t^2 / 2 : ℝ → ℝ) atTop (𝓝 (1 / 2 * (Real.sqrt (Real.exp 1))^2)) := by
          -- Use the fact that the limit of t^2/2 as t approaches infinity is infinity
          have h₉ : Tendsto (fun t => t^2 : ℝ → ℝ) atTop atTop := by
            simpa using tendsto_id.pow 2
          have h₁₀ : Tendsto (fun t => t^2 / 2 : ℝ → ℝ) atTop atTop := by
            simpa using h₉.div_const 2
          have h₁₁ : Tendsto (fun t => t^2 / 2 : ℝ → ℝ) atTop (𝓝 (1 / 2 * (Real.sqrt (Real.exp 1))^2)) := by
            convert h₁₀.congr (fun t => by ring) using 1
            <;> field_simp [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq] <;> ring_nf <;> norm_num
            <;> nlinarith [Real.exp_pos 1, Real.sqrt_nonneg (Real.exp 1), Real.sq_sqrt (Real.exp_pos 1).le]
          exact h₁₁
        have h₁₂ : 1 / 2 * (Real.sqrt (Real.exp 1))^2 = Real.sqrt (Real.exp 1) := by
          field_simp [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq] <;> ring_nf <;> nlinarith [Real.exp_pos 1, Real.sqrt_nonneg (Real.exp 1), Real.sq_sqrt (Real.exp_pos 1).le]
        simp_all
      simp_all [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq] <;> nlinarith [Real.exp_pos 1, Real.sqrt_nonneg (Real.exp 1), Real.sq_sqrt (Real.exp_pos 1).le]
    exact h₅
  exact h₄
